author: marco-link
body:
This adds trigger monitors for efficiency vs invariant dijetmass Mjj and efficiency vs leading jet softdropmass.
The monitors are then used for these triggers:

- HLT_PFHT1050_v*
- HLT_AK8PFJet500_v*
- HLT_AK8PFHT750_TrimMass50_v*
- HLT_AK8PFHT800_TrimMass50_v*
- HLT_AK8PFHT850_TrimMass50_v*
- HLT_AK8PFHT900_TrimMass50_v*
title: Add Mjj and Softdrop monitor to OfflineDQM for B2G analysis
